name: Side Quest: The Isle of Cats
description:
The last thing you can remember, you were on a tropical island, desperately trying to corral all of those adorable, mischievous, and frankly difficult cats.

Now you wake to find yourself locked in a cage in the hold of a ship, almost certainly from Vesh's fleet. You can't see much down here in the dark, but from the sound of things, they captured the cats, too.

Side Quest: The Isle of Cats is a puzzle game set in the world of well-known board game The Isle of Cats. The game test your creativity, perceptiveness, and ability to think outside the box. Solve the puzzles and escape the ship to save not just your own life, but the lives of these adorable creatures. They don't want to co-operate in the beginning, but you're sure you will gain their trust and together you will escape this horrible trap and find your way back home.

—description from the publisher
